summary: This bill, the 'Strengthen American Competitiveness Against Harmful Subsidies Act of 2025,' mandates the United States Trade Representative (USTR) to monitor industrial subsidies provided by the Chinese government. The USTR, in coordination with various government entities, will report annually to Congress outlining the risks these subsidies pose to U.S. employment, manufacturing, and strategically critical industries. The report will also recommend actions to mitigate these risks.
